Windlord:

Landed and quickly ran towards CR's, left Cooley in one and program 
it to fill Cooley reparation's needs.

After that he opene his comlink to Rodimus and said "Rodimus Are you 
there??? Have kup told you my message???? if he doeasn't I heve to 
told you it befoer the battle with Unicron.."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Cooley:
> Looking up to WinLord with his Biological eyes, "Are you my 
Angel?" after those words his eyelids shut and winlord feels his 
body going limp.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "Ok" said Windlord "I'll come back soon in case that you don't 
come 
> back to base..."
> 
> He flew towards the Maxiaml Base
>

> > SureStike:
> > Responds on the Come link. "We are under Fire right now but we 
> found the two missing, Was it a clone of one of us that got him? 
We 
> are fighting Clones right now. The Relay is setup so send a 
message

the
